text:
FoodRunner - Singapore, Manila and Kuala Lumpur - Full Time

http://foodrunner.com.sg/

We're building a team to help South East Asia's largest food delivery companies get the most out of technology. Everything from better websites and mobile applications, to order processing, coordination and communication.

Passion trumps specific skills/tech. There's currently a lot of RoR, but we plan on introducing significant components in other languages. Full stack with some specialisation is the best fit right now, as well as 1 or 2 more front-end and/or design focused developers.
